notes.text: Graduate coursework bridging computer science with human factors, neuroscience, and AI security.

items.title: COSC 559 - Human-Computer Interaction
items.subtitle: Fundamentals of HCI examining how human factors affect interface design and usability, covering perception, cognition, and user-centered design methodologies.

items.title: PSYC 410 - Sensory Processes and Perception
items.subtitle: Exploration of how sensory systems process information and how perception emerges from neural mechanisms, with relevance to computational neuroscience.
